entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
